result.title: Provision for Unscheduled Expert Meetings and Workshops as required
result.description: Provision for the organisation of non-scheduled (i.e. not included in the current Work Packages) Networking Meetings, Expert Meetings, etc., as may be requested by the Commission/Atlantic Ocean Research Alliance. The Due Date on this Deliverable is UNCERTAIN (TBD) and will depend on the sequence with which the Atlantic Research Alliance wish to progress dialogue on these research priorities and the scheduling of parallel/mirror USA and Canadian activities. This will be monitored, reviewed and reported upon over the lifetime of the project.

result.title: EU-Asia Pacific Industry events report
result.description: This deliverable will report on the first industry events organised in each target country to strengthen the links between ICT RDI actors. It will include a monitoring of the established relations, an analysis of the events outcomes, and a summary of the lessons learned along with recommendations to ensure sustainable partnerships. The final version of the report will be elaborated at to report on the industry events organised during the entire project lifetime.
